name: Critical Engine Faliure
description:
Your engine has failed on the highway, and you have somewhere very important to be! Maintain velocity by letting fast moving traffic hit you from behind. Don't hit cars with your front or side bumpers, or you will lose speed. Avoid the side barriers as well. Keep your speed above zero! Distance to the goal is displayed next to the speedometer.

By Jacob Palomarez
Made for GMTK Jam 2018 in under 48 hours

Sound effects from freesound.org
